subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Despite knee problems and doubters, Williams, who fell two wins short of a Grand Slam in 2015, will be ready to defend her title in Melbourne when the tournament begins next week, her coach said.
snippet: Despite knee problems and doubters, Williams, who fell two wins short of a Grand Slam in 2015, will be ready to defend her title in Melbourne when the tournament begins next week, her coach said.
